Happy spouse, grandparent, cat companion, yiddish student, legal aid worker,
lover of life, & democratic pluralism.

Northwest Regional Organizing Committee for Legal Aid, a mythical cat committee for community-centered lawyering.

Profile Image: Black cat & red & black starburst background over text: "Strike!"

Banner: D. Lopez Marvel panel of Captain Marvel holding orange flerkin. Carol's speech balloon: "If anything happened to you or your beautiful family ... my heart would shatter."
